ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Van Allen Probe B TOF x Energy Ion Fluxes 0.02-1 MeV measured at high energy resolution and low time resolution (with multi-spin accumulations plotted at end of accumulation in sector order)
ResourceHeader.Description: TOF x Energy Ion Fluxes 0.02-1 MeV measured at high energy resolution and low time resolution (with multi-spin accumulations plotted at end of accumulation in sector order)

InformationURL.Name: Current QuickLook & Summary Plots, Instrument Information and All Data
Van Allen Probes Science Gateway
InformationURL.Description: Science Gateway (including Mission Rules of the Road for Data Usage)

AccessURL.Name: FTP access to files at SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via ftp from CDAWeb

AccessURL.Name: HTTP access to files at SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from SPDF

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the CDAWeb team at GSFC/SPDF.

Parameter.Name: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Ephemeris Time of the start of the accumulation for this measurement.
Parameter.Caveats: This is the Ephemeris Time saved as a TT2000 CDF Variable. The difference between the ET value and the TT value is less than a millisecond. The ET time values have an accuracy of no greater than 3 milliseconds hence it was determined that there was no reason to convert the ET values into TT.

Parameter.Name: UTC
Parameter.Description: UTC

Parameter.Name: SCLOCK_Full
Parameter.Description: SCLOCK_Full

Parameter.Name: ET
Parameter.Description: The ephemeris time at the start of the measurement.

Parameter.Name: MidET
Parameter.Description: The ephemeris time at the mid-point of the measurement. For multi-spin measurements the midET is centered so that it properly represents the time to be used to calculate the look direction of the instrument.

Parameter.Name: StopET
Parameter.Description: The ephemeris time at the end of the accumulation of the measurement

Parameter.Name: Telescope No.
Parameter.Description: Identifies the telescope used to collect the measurement

Parameter.Name: Channel
Parameter.Description: Identifies the channel used to collect the measurement

Parameter.Name: Energy
Parameter.Description: Midpoint energy of the measurement channel. A value of -1 indicates that an energy definition for this channel is not applicable

Parameter.Name: FIDU
Parameter.Description: FIDU: Ion flux spectrograms in energy, by telescope in sector order (multi-spin accums plotted at end of accum)

Parameter.Name: FIDU
Parameter.Description: ---> Telescope-energy images

Parameter.Name: FIDU_Error
Parameter.Description: ---> The percentage error of the measurement.

Parameter.Name: FIDU_Crosscalib_RMSE
Parameter.Description: ---> RMS Error of the natural log of the flux for each channel.
Parameter.Caveats: This error value includes all errors associated with the measurement including cross calibration errors

Parameter.Name: FIDU_Quality
Parameter.Description: ---> Quality flag for the measurement for each telescope/channel/timestep. .see PREBM standards for definition

Parameter.Name: Sector
Parameter.Description: ---> The current sector number where each spin is divided into 36 sectors.

Parameter.Name: Duration
Parameter.Description: ---> Duration of the accumulation.

Parameter.Name: Spin
Parameter.Description: ---> The current spin number of the spacecraft

Parameter.Name: OrbitNumber
Parameter.Description: Orbit Number at the time of the measurement

Parameter.Name: L
Parameter.Description: ---> Dipole L value calculated using the SM Reference Frame and taken from the definitive SPICE SPK kernels that are available at the time.

Parameter.Name: Position_SM
Parameter.Description: ---> Position of the spacecraft in SM coordinates

Parameter.Name: OrbitNumber
Parameter.Description: [Labels on plots] Orbit Number at the time of the measurement

Parameter.Name: L
Parameter.Description: ---> [Labels on plots] Dipole L value calculated using the SM Reference Frame and taken from the definitive SPICE SPK kernels that are available at the time.

Parameter.Name: Position_SM
Parameter.Description: ---> [Labels on plots] Position of the spacecraft in SM coordinates

Parameter.Name: FIDU_Energy
Parameter.Description: Midpoint energy of the measurement channel. A value of -1 indicates that an energy definition for this channel is not applicable

Parameter.Name: FIDU_EnergyRange
Parameter.Description: Minimum and Maximum energy of the measurement channel. A value of -1 indicates that either an energy definition for this channel is not applicable or that the upper end of the channel is undefined - i.e. the channel becomes integral.
